headers.value: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://*.filebase.com https://*.web3auth.io https://*.ethereum.org https://*.polygon.technology https://*.infura.io https://*.alchemy.com wss://*.infura.io wss://*.alchemy.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://*.web3auth.io; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none';
